trans-unit.source: Verifies a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS#1 v1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Vérifie une signature Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS#1 v1.5.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: Instance de Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) qui contient la clé.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> avec la clé spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Nom de l'algorithme de hachage à utiliser pour le déformateur de signatures.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie l'algorithme de hachage pour le déformateur de signatures Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="strName" /> parameter does not map to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Le paramètre <paramref name="strName" /> ne correspond pas à l'algorithme de hachage <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is not used.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode n'est pas utilisée.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> algorithm requires the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Le <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> algorithme requiert le <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> algorithme de hachage.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: Instance de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> qui contient la clé.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie la clé à utiliser pour le déformateur de signatures Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with <c>rgbSignature</c>.
trans-unit.target: Données signées avec <c>rgbSignature</c>.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for <c>rgbHash</c>.
trans-unit.target: Signature à vérifier pour <c>rgbHash</c>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature on the data.
trans-unit.target: Vérifie la signature Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) sur les données.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid for the data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la signature est valide pour les données ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The DSA key is missing.
trans-unit.target: La clé DSA est manquante.
